name: Twitter Undistracted
description:
If you can read this, congrats. Userstyles website have been very slow to load. Due to this, I've moved the style to Github, which you can install via Stylus addons. Any upcoming updates will be served there.
A minimized Twitter interface with a motivation that lets you focus more on what people tweet and response with less judgments on their character. What this style does to your Twitter * Removes profile picture, because you don't wanna care what people look like * Removes followings/followers count, because it adds nothing valuable in this society * Removes unnecessary tabs and sidebar, because it's distracting * Keeps you focus and avoid unnecessary simping over stupid tweets by a twitter thot
additional_info: v1.5 (21 July 2020) - removed Direct Message popup v1.4 (17 June 2020) - updated CSS classes for profile picture removal and followers/following count - re-enabled "footer" because it's kinda useful v1.3 (19 May 2020) - removes notification badges in Notification and profile chooser - removes followings/followers bar in user profile - removes 'followed by whom' in user profile v1.2 - removes profile picture - removes home, explore, bookmarks tab - removes Trending/Who to follow sidebar v1.2.1 - included mobile.twitter.com domain
